functions.tag:
{author:"Avantir Yihn",title:"Strength",resolved:1b,pages:["Willpower represents your casting capability. The strength of the effect depends on the scroll being cast.

-Reduces cast time
-Reduces cast time growth
-Reduces casting stamina cost
-Increases scroll effect duration","-Increases Fireball power","Endurance represents how much foreign energy you can store to channel into your movements without growing tired.

+2 Maximum Stamina/Level","Vitality represents your toughness in the heat of combat. Ordinarily one possesses no special vitality, but by channeling the yearning power of a reaper properly, one can strengthen their defenses by striking foes.","-20% less damage taken from all sources per effect level (Additive)
-Resets when damage is taken
-Number of effect levels proportional to stamina expended in melee combat
-Stamina thresholds for effect levels: 1/13/29/48/101
-Maximum effect level equal to Vitality level"]}
